abstract: Bob Tedeschi App Smart column; apps like Dynolicious measure your car’s horsepower, speed and braking power and let you share those statistics with others.
snippet: Apps like Dynolicious measure your car’s horsepower, speed and braking power and let you share those statistics with others.
lead_paragraph: Apps like Dynolicious measure your car’s horsepower, speed and braking power and let you share those statistics with others.

headline.main: Tracking Your Car’s Performance (or Lack of It) by Phone
headline.print_headline: Tracking Your Car’s Performance (or Lack of It) by Phone
